data.title: DiverSci-Fi Book Club: Now Reading "A Door into Ocean" by Joan Slonczewski
data.meta_description: Here we go reading again! This is an adult book club with the aim of being open and accessible to everyone, and to read as many sci-fi & fantasy works from diverse authors as we can.
